item.title: Kokekoko
item.description: KoKeKoKo John Rhey Damian, Anngelo Rommel Guanga, Gabriel Kristoffer Salido View Repository Description A StarCraft II bot that uses the Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) algorithm to manage the Micro and Macro tasks of the game. John Rhey Damian, Anngelo Rommel Guanga, and Gabriel Kristoffer developed the bot as their thesis for BS Computer Science. KoKeKoKo uses s2client-api, a C++ library, for bot control while connected to a C# console for the implementation of artificial intelligence.
